runs.comm: excellent start for RP Singh, he bowls it full outside off stump and the ball swings away from Butt who plays a cover drive without moving his feet and gets beaten
banged in short down leg side, Pakistan are away with a wide
pitches on a good length outside off stump, Butt waits on the back foot and plays it down to third man for a single
RP Singh angles it across Nazir from over the wicket, Nazir tries to cut off the back foot but the ball seams into him and cramps him for room, he gets an inside edge past the stumps
Nazir tries to pull it but hits it to Harbhajan at square leg, ambitious shot for the length wasn't short enough
RP Singh bowls it wide outside off stump, Nazir chases it and tries to cut but gets beaten, it's called wide
defended towards Yuvraj at point off the back foot
too much width outside off stump, Nazir backs away and smashes it through covers for the first boundary of the innings
full ball on off stump, Butt drives superbly through point but Yuvraj dives to his left and saves a certain boundary
full ball outside off stump, Nazir backs away and tries to hit that to Cape Town but the ball swings away from him and beats the outside edge
Sreesanth over-steps and strays down leg side, free hit coming up
Sreesanth bowls a slower ball outside off, Nazir tries to pull it but gets an inside edge through midwicket
pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams in towards the left-hander, Butt lets it go
tight line and length around off stump, the ball shapes into the left-hander and Butt waits on the back foot and defends back to Sreesanth

caught! or not! Sreesanth gets the ball to seam into Butt who drives away from his body, the ball hits an inside edge and Dhoni dives to his right to take the catch,  it's a very low catch and there is doubt about whether that carried, the umpires chat about whether that carried and decide that it didn't
bowled him! Nazir tries to slog one through midwicket, he misses and the ball hits leg stump, that was a dismissal waiting to happen because Nazir was slogging at everything
driven off the back foot to mid-off
too short and the line is poor as well, on leg stump, Akmal swivels and pulls the ball to the fine leg boundary
pitches on a good length on off stump, the ball angles across Akmal who tries to pull without moving his feet, the ball beats the bat
once again RP Singh bowls too short, poor stuff from the bowler when the pitch is offering so much, Akmal has plenty of time to get into position and pull it into the stands at square leg
full and straight , swinging into Butt's blockhole, he pushes it towards the off side and gets a single
excellent ball, it pitches on a length outside off stump and seams away from the right hander, Akmal pokes at it and gets beaten
a bit straighter from Sreesanth and Akmal drives to mid-on for a single
far too wide outside off stump, that's another extra, India cannot afford this
pitches on a good length outside off stump and angles across the left-hander, Butt waits on the back foot and tries to cut but gets beaten

the attempted slower ball goes horribly wrong, it finishes up as a gentle full toss on leg stump, Butt leans across his stumps and flicks it past square leg for four, Uthappa dives on the boundary but can't save it
Butt tries to cut a ball that is too close to his body and is beaten
RP Singh bowls a little short and Akmal tries to pull him again, this time Akmal misses and gets hit on the thigh
RP Singh bowls it fuller outside off stump and gets it to jag back into Akmal's mid-riff, excellent ball, Akmal fends it towards the off side
Butt waits on the back foot and opens the face to run the ball towards third man
RP Singh pitches just short of a length on leg stump, Akmal tries to flick but gets hit on the pad
poor bowling, another wide, this time down leg side
good length delivery angles into the left hander, Butt stands in his crease and defends towards cover point
lovely ball, the length outside off stump has Butt in two minds - whether to play off the back foot or come forward - he ends up fending at it and gets beaten
driven to mid-off for a single
over-pitched on off and middle stump, Butt leans forward and drives with a full face of the bat to send the ball racing to the long-on boundary, elegant shot
Butt tries to play the square drive a little too hard and hits it into the ground towards Yuvraj at point
pitches on a good length outside off stump and angles away from the left-hander, left alone by the batsman
Sreesanth bowls a sharp bouncer at 137 kmh, Butt tries to pull but doesn't connect
over-pitched outside the off stump, Butt drives superbly off the front foot wide of mid-off but Pathan moves quickly towards his right and dives, outstanding effort
played off the pads towards square leg where Harbhajan moves to his left and makes the save
RP Singh angles the ball into Butt who gets an inside edge on to the pad, Akmal calls Butt through for a single, Yuvraj sprints in but doesn't hit the stumps
played with an open face through backward point
excellent length outside the off stump, the ball bounces sharply on Butt who gets caught on the crease, he tries to play it late but got beaten
Butt moves towards leg to make room but RP Singh follows him, cramps Butt for room and beats him with the bounce
pushed off the pads towards midwicket for a single
strays on to the pads, Butt flicks to Karthik at deep backward square leg
caught! Agarkar gets one to bounce sharply from a  good length, Butt gets caught on the back foot and tries to run it down to third man, he gets an edge that's comfortably taken by Dhoni
good length ball outside off stump, Younis gets off the mark by running it down to third man
too short from Agarkar, Akmal swivels and pulls it to deep square leg, there's a fielder in the deep now, after Akmal hit RP Singh in that area
pushed to point off the front foot, Younis sets off for the run and then sends Akmal back, Yuvraj picks up but lobs the ball towards the bowler's end, that could have been a run-out
driven off the front foot to deep cover

this time Yuvraj hits! Younis pushes the ball to point and Akmal scurries down the pitch, Younis doesn't want the run, Yuvraj picks up cleanly and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end with Akmal well short
played to Yuvraj at point
Younis tries to cut but gets beaten by the angle across him
full ball outside off stump, Younis comes forward and drives to Yuvraj at point
bowled him! Irfan angles the ball across Younis who comes forward and tries to defend, the ball bounces a bit more, hits the glove and crashes into the stumps, huge wicket for India
good length ball outside the off stump, Misbah lets it go, Pathan completes a maiden over
just a fraction short from Agarkar but that's all Malik needs to swivel and pull all along the ground for four, superb shot
driven off the back foot towards point where Yuvraj moves to his right and fields, he's in excellent form
Malik tries to run one fine towards third man but gets beaten
good length ball outside the off stump, Malik opens the face and guides the ball towards third man
played past backward point for a single, Misbah's off the mark
good length ball angles into Malik who waits on the back foot and defends towards the off side
pitches on leg stump and angles across Misbah who gets into a tangle while trying to flick, the ball hits one pad and then hits the other
streaky boundary, Misbah tries to cut a ball that angles across him but it swings back into him and hits the inside edge, the ball bounces over Dhoni and runs to the boundary
defended to the leg side
good length ball on off and middle stump, Misbah leans forward and defends back to Pathan
too wide outside the off stump, Umpire Doctrove thinks over it and then extends his arms
Misbah tries to pull but the ball isn't short enough and he mis-times it to square leg
full delivery outside off stump, Malik opens the face and plays it to third man
bowled flat on middle and leg stump, flicked off the pads behind square
bowled slower through the air on off and middle stump, played through square leg once again
driven down to long-on for a single
a bit too short and wide outside off stump from Harbhajan, it was the doosra, Misbah cuts past Sreesanth at short third man
Misbah leans forward in defense, the ball hist the pad and lobs up, Dhoni runs in front of the batsman and takes the catch but there was no bat in it
terrible fielding from RP Singh, India have been good in the field today but that was shoddy, Harbhajan dropped it short and Misbah pulled to deep square leg where RP singh over ran the ball
cut towards point off the back foot
too full and on the pads, Malik flicks the ball fine and the fielder at fine leg has no chance
good length delivery on off and middle stump, driven with a straight bat back to Pathan
Pathan offers width outside off stump, Malik cuts off the back foot in front of point
defended off the back foot towards Yuvraj at point
good line from Pathan, keeping it tight around the off stump, Misbah pushes the ball towards cover point on the front foot
too short from Harbhajan, Misbah has plenty of time to pull to RP Singh at long leg
driven to long-off for a single
Harbhajan drifts on to leg once again, flicked to the fielder at short fine leg
tossed up on off stump, driven off the front foot to long-off
Harbhajan sees the batsman step down the track and fires in a quick one, played to midwicket
Misbah moves across his stumps and tries to sweep fine, Pathan moves to his right at short fine leg, dives and stops the ball
pushed off the back foot towards cover point
Malik tries to drive through midwicket but gets an inside edge down to fine leg
short ball outside the off stump, Misbah flat-bats it over cover
excellent delivery, full outside the off stump, Malik tries to squeeze it through the offside but gets yorked
Malik picks this one up from middle stump and swings it over midwicket, the ball bounces a fraction inside the boundary
caught! Malik tries to hit another one over midwicket but the ball is angling across him and he only gets a top edge that flies high in the air to Harbhajan at cover who takes a simple catch
driven to long off for a single
played to backward square leg for one more
fired in quickly to the blockhole, Afridi backs away and drives to long-on
Harbhajan fires in fast and full, Afridi tries to drive straight but hits it hard into the ground and back to Harbhajan
Afridi backs away but Harbhajan follows him with another yorker
Afridi makes room and lofts over cover, Karthik runs back and makes a despairing dive but he was never going to catch that
good length ball outside the off stump, Misbah tries to cut but gets beaten
cut down to third man for a single

dropped! Afridi tried to pull a ball that wasn;t that short and skied the top edge, Agarkar stopped in his follow through, turned and went for the catch, Harbhajan was running towards it from mid-off but agarkar went for it and couldn't hold on, you can't afford to drop Afridi
smashed straight back over the bowler's head for four, awesome power
played past pint for a single
Afridi backs away and tries to smash it over the cover boundary but misses, the ball misses the stumps by very little
full ball on middle stump, Harbhajan's not allowing the batsman to get under the ball, Misbah drives to long on
hit over the fielder at midwicket for a single, Afridi tried to make room but Harbhajan followed him
played to short fine leg for one more
caught! Afridi tries to blast another one out of the ground, it's a low full toss from Harbhajan and this time the top edge is safely held by Karthik at mid-off, crucial wicket this
flighted delivery on off stump, Misbah backs away and lofts cleanly back over the bowler's head, powerful shot
this time he picks out deep midwicket and lofts cleanly once again, he's picked the gap in the deep to perfection
too short from Agarkar and that's pulled away to the midwicket boundary, that's the wrong length from Agarkar
full ball outside the off stump, driven to Sehwag at deep cover, his throw is poor and the batsmen take two
length once again from Agarkar and he gets dispatched to the wide long-on boundary once again, that shot had a lot of power
Arafat throws his bat at it again, trying to hit Agarkar over cover but gets an outside edge to third man
clever shot, Misbah moves to the off side and chips a full ball over the fielder at short fine leg, Pakistan are on fire at the moment
full ball outside the off stump, driven to deep cover for two more, huge over for Pakistan, 17 from it
full ball outside the off stump, driven straight to Yuvraj at point, just the single
length delivery outside the off stump, Misbah backs away and hammers the ball over cover, it bounces just inside the boundary, superb stuff from Misbah
full ball on middle stump, driven to long-on for a single but poor fielding allows the second
full toss on off stump, mid-off was in the circle and Misbah drives past him, he brings up his fifty and the scores are level, superb innings
short of a length outside off stump, Misbah tries to cut but gets beaten

it's a tie! Misbah can't get it away and hits it towards cover, Yuvraj runs in, picks up the ball and throws it to the non-strikers end, Sreesanth whips off the bails with Misbah well short of his crease, delirious scenes at Kingsmead
